instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.D7012: What is D7012? Diode between ground and gate of Q7010 on 2013-2015 year model macbook airs, necessary for Q7010 to allow PPDCIN_G3H to flow through to PP3V42_G3H power supply input. When this diode dies or corrodes, PP3V42_G3H input will not have any voltage, and chargers will not turn on. This can often be the problem if a system only works with a knockoff charger/bench power supply. .
definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..
definitions.820-3209: What is 820-3209? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Parts needed for macbook air boards
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - needs <CHIP>U6990</CHIP>
820 - 3437 - needs <DIODE>D7012</DIODE>
Macbook Pro late 2012 SN c02jf3qzdkq2 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>

I have looked around for parts, but not been able to find anything so is it donor boards for parts like that?

Thanks

threads.title: Parts needed for macbook air boards
threads.message:
They are all common parts to macbook board. LT3470 can be found on many boards, that zener diode is on 3209/3462/00164. 
Get some donor boards.

threads.title: Parts needed for macbook air boards
threads.message: No problem, thanks I will look for boards then.
